metadata.description: Too Much Coffee Man comes to BOOM! Town! Shannon Wheeler's titan of alt-comix returns in this digital edition of the classic #1 issue. In advance of the new Too Much Coffee Man: Cutie Island graphic novel coming next year, and on the heels of Wheeler's Eisner win for Best Humor Publication, wet your caffeine whistle with a dose of everyone's favorite anxiety-riddled superhuman. Share in the whole-bean pathos of the stories that launched Too Much Coffee Man into 20 years of bringing us the best in angst and hilarity!
metadata.name: Too Much Coffee Man
